name: The Night Of The Spook
description:
This game was created in 4 days for "Low Effort Jam 16".

PUT ON FULL SCREEN!!!

Yanay :  @GildayYanay
Sap Squad:
HelloWhirled: @benhellowhirled  https://hellowhirled.bandcamp.com/album/decomposition-soundtrack 

HOW TO PLAY

You are a kid, trying to collect as many candies and come back home, go to each of the four houses to get access to your home, but be careful of what waits there. 

If you lose in a game, the game will get spoooooookier.

Click on a house to enter its game.

MINIGAMES HOW TO PLAY

Memory Game: use the mouse to flip cards before the time end.
Pipe Connect: click a pipe to rotate it, and on the source, pipe to let water out.
Rotating Maze: use the right and left arrows to rotate the boards without touching the red walls. Try to get to the exit.
Candy Catch: catch the candy (you only need to touch it with the basket) and don't catch the office supply  (you only need to touch it with the basket).
